message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose an offer of $10500. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still looking for a price that reflects the true value of the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11500. What do you think?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I really appreciate your flexibility. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose an offer of $11000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make another adjustment to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $11750. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I am still aiming to keep within my budget. I would like to propose an offer of $11500. I hope this can be a mutually beneficial solution.

I'm starting to get close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I'm offering the product to you for $12200. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I am still working within my budget constraints. I would like to propose an offer of $12000. I hope this can be a fair compromise.
I'm getting close to my limit, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I'm offering the product to you for $12500. This is my final offer. What do you think?

Thank you for your last offer, Alice. I have carefully considered our negotiations, and I would like to propose a final offer of $12250. I hope this can be a satisfactory conclusion to our discussions.
